# How to Install LaBB-CAT

These pages include instructions on how to install LaBB-CAT on various operating systems:

- [Red Hat Linux](rhel.qmd)
- [Mac](standalone-mac.qmd)
- [Windows](standalone-windows.qmd)

## Praat Browser Integration

When you are browsing a LaBB-CAT corpus (either installed on your own computer or on a server),
the transcript page can integrate directly with Praat so that you can open utterance in Praat
directly from your browser.

- [Installing Praat Browser Integration](praat/praat-browser.qmd)
